Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Diagonal L Illa a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The rooms were much larger than I had expected which was a pleasant surprise and was very clean and nicely decorated Good breakfast buffet and great location I would stay there again

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Diagonal L Illa a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: No pool coffee machines hard to use even the ones at the buffet Everything around it was closed on Sunday luckily some restaurants nearby were open One of the stored blankets in the closet had blood on it next day they changed it
Positive_Review: Beautiful hotel Convenient business center where I printed my flight tickets Helpful staff

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Diagonal L Illa a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Did not keep to type of bed ordered told me that they cannot guarantee and if I wanted guarantee I should have booked directly through marriott website
Positive_Review: Position

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Diagonal L Illa a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: No food at room service only cheese and ham platter wasn t nice at all Water didint drain quick enough but wasn t blocked or dirty No kettle in a room so my boyfriend wasn t happy that he couldn t have cup of tea on arrival so we had to ask for kettle tea and milk
Positive_Review: Very nice stylish hotel very comfortable Nice coffee machine I absolutely love nesspresso Staff very nice especially man on our check out shame I don t remember his name he was absolutely lovely

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Diagonal L Illa a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Breakfast should have more options room service menu should also be expanded for more options
Positive_Review: The location was excellent with shops and restaurants close by and metro station a 5 min walk away

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Diagonal L Illa a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Taxi strike upon my arrival So with public transport it takes a lot of time to arrive to the hotel but of course not the fault of the hotel
Positive_Review: Bed very comfortable Staff very friendly Corte ingles next door Nice wine bar with DJ opposite

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Diagonal L Illa a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Breakfast was expensive which was 22pp a day or 15pp for each day of our trip There was a group of 8 of us and it cost us 30 in total for all of us in a cafe in the shopping center Parking in the car park is also expensive
Positive_Review: Staff were very nice and friendly always helpful The room was very big for family of 2 adults and 2 kids under 5 The design of the hotel is very nice and the location is perfect Right in the Illa shopping center so we did not need to go far for shopping and food There is a park next to the shopping center also for the kids with small amusement rides

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Diagonal L Illa a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The hotel needs to invest in proper ironing boards and good irons
Positive_Review: Very nice location friendly and helpful staff very clean rooms with Nespreso capsules coffee machine at no extra charge Beds changed everyday with new clean towels on a daily basis Excellent shopping facilities near by and within short walking distance to metro Maria Christina Good breakfast spread as it was my anniversary the hotel hand delivered chocolates with a special wish card A very nice gesture

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Diagonal L Illa a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Noise from 2 nd floor dining area kept me awake until 12 00 am on the Saturday We were on the 3 rd floor
Positive_Review: Staff were excellent particularly Jonathan Castilla We had to extend our stay because our cruise was unexpectedly cancelled He was very helpful in assisting us with staying in the same room and went the extra mile which helped in the stress of having to make new arrangements for our travel

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Diagonal L Illa a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: There s no swimming pool I would have really liked one apart from that no problems at all and you can always go to the beach
Positive_Review: The beds was really comfortable the staff was lovely and very helpful and the rooms were always clean Very good transport outside the hotel Overall I really enjoyed my stay and I didn t want to leave

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Diagonal L Illa a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The only problem is you pay for wifi in your bedroom
Positive_Review: Worth staying here good centre point easy access to central also airport Shopping centre within and very clean nice people very friendly
